analysis.description:
Token.crowdsaleContractAddress (/unique_chucks/21/0x29539bcb0b0fc23b9a49dfd87a68f0a0f5765ea7.sol#119-120) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- mintTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x29539bcb0b0fc23b9a49dfd87a68f0a0f5765ea7.sol#171-182)

Token.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/21/0x29539bcb0b0fc23b9a49dfd87a68f0a0f5765ea7.sol#182-185) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20Token(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/21/0x29539bcb0b0fc23b9a49dfd87a68f0a0f5765ea7.sol#183-185)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x29539bcb0b0fc23b9a49dfd87a68f0a0f5765ea7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/21/0x29539bcb0b0fc23b9a49dfd87a68f0a0f5765ea7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_init_quantity' of IERC20Token.createSDC (/unique_chucks/21/0x29539bcb0b0fc23b9a49dfd87a68f0a0f5765ea7.sol#38) is not in mixedCase
